short_summary: Procurement of one combined Sputter Coater and Carbon Evaporator
description: The Natural Resources Canada, CanmetENERGY Devon, has a requirement for the supply and delivery of one combined Sputter Coater and Carbon Evaporator. The instrument will be used for depositing thin conductive metal films and carbon films on specimen surfaces suitable for scanning electron microscopic analysis for the Marine Conservation Targets project.
tags: combined Sputter Coater and Carbon Evaporator
full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement

## Reference Information

* Solicitation Number: NRCan-5000072754-A
* Publication Date: November 22, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: January 2, 2024, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 18, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

## Procurement Details

* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Alberta

## Notice Description

A combined Sputter Coater and Carbon Evaporator is required for depositing thin conductive metal films and carbon films on specimen surfaces suitable for scanning electron microscopic analysis. The instrument will be used for the Marine Conservation Targets project at CanmetENERGY Devon (CE-D).

## Contracting Entity Information

* Contracting Entity Name: Natural Resources Canada
* Contracting Entity Address:
	+ Street Address: 580 Booth Street
	+ City: Ottawa
	+ Province: Ontario
	+ Postal Code: K1A 0E4
	+ Country: Canada

## Contact Information

* Name: Thihan Dissanayake
* Email: thihan.dissanayake@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca
* Phone: 613-293-9901
* Address:
	+ Street Address: 580 Booth Street
	+ City: Ottawa
	+ Province: Ontario
	+ Postal Code: K1A 0E4
	+ Country: Canada

## Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Document Attachments

The tender notice and related documents can be found at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25617/notice-of-proposed-procurement-%28npp---nrcan-5000072754-a.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25617/notice-of-proposed-procurement-%28npp---nrcan-5000072754-a.pdf) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25617/avis-de-projet-de-marche-%28apm---rncan-5000072754-a.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites
